resources.string: \t ♠Make sure you have a valid internet connection
\t ♦You might be streaming too fast, while using a slow internet connection
\t ♦You might have been continuously trying many streamings in a short amount of time
\t ♦You might have tried to change the streaming speed before starting to stream
\t ♠Change the streaming speed after you have started streaming
\t ♦When the Search is fired, and the app crashes, you must have definitely lost internet connection
\t ♠Sometimes there might be a small delay when pressing the Sign In With Twitter button
\t ☆Entering a keyword and firing it will bring up top tweets\n
\t ☆Stream button will allow live tweets to flow each 2.5 seconds\n
\t ☆SpeedUpStream will increase streaming speed by 0.5 seconds. Maximum value is 1 second i.e tweets will flow at most, each 1 second\n
\t ☆SlowDownStream will decrease streaming speed by 0.5 seconds. Minimum value is 5 seconds i.e tweets will flow at least, each 5 seconds\n
\t ☆MyKeyWord will display your recent entered keyword\n
